name: AGU Brushy
description: AGU Brushy is an application for a smart toothbrush AGU Brushy, which helps children learn to properly brush their teeth in an interesting and playful way and makes the tooth brushing process an entertaining game. Using the AGU Brushy app, your child will develop a healthy habit of regular tooth brushing.  Due to an exciting play scenario, your child will not only learn to brush teeth in a proper way, but will also enjoy the process of fighting microbes in the mouth. Of course! In fact, the proper brushing will provide a fun reward, which, in turn, will tell more about a new friend of a child - Brushy!  The character Brushy has come here from the GRRRR tooth planet, the inhabitants of which take care of peoples health on Earth. There are research laboratories on the GRRRR planet, where scientists come up with new ways of protecting teeth and fighting microbes. There are also special tooth bases for monitoring caries activity anywhere in the world. Now, one of Brushy has settled in your smartphone along with a smart toothbrush AGU Brushy!  With a connected toothbrush AGU Brushy, the routine tooth brushing becomes an entertaining game.  The AGU Brushy app also includes useful auxiliary functions for parents. Detailed tooth brushing statistics, brushing reminders, recommendations for cleaning those areas of the childs mouth that need to be cleaned more thoroughly, - all these functions are available for parents.
